mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon(cid, member_mid, type, price) VALUES (coupon_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberMid}, #{type}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date FROM ( SELECT cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date FROM coupon WHERE member_mid = ${paramId} AND branch_name IS NULL GROUP BY cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date ORDER BY type DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date FROM ( SELECT cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date FROM coupon WHERE member_mid = ${paramId} AND branch_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY cid, member_mid, type, price, branch_name, is_used, payment_date ORDER BY is_used, type DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT c.cid, c.member_mid, m.name as name, c.type, c.price, c.branch_name, c.is_used, c.payment_date FROM coupon c, member m WHERE branch_name = #{branchName} AND c.member_mid = m.mid ORDER BY payment_date DESC
